passages.text:
//The human looks up as you near the table. Their eyes manage to convey both vague interest, and complete indifference. At first, it looks like their right arm is encased in a metal gauntlet, but as you get a closer look you realize that it's actually completly robotic.//

[["Hey there, name's Jessie." ->IntroNorm]]

[["Howdy partner, place for one more?" ->IntroPumped]]

[["Uh, hi." ->IntroShame]]
passages.name: Nona

passages.text:
Hey there, my name's Jessie.

[[Continue. ->HeyWantTo]]

[["And I'm a cowboy." ->LookWork]]
passages.name: IntroNorm

passages.text:
Howdy partner, is there place for one more?

[[Continue. ->I'mNona]]
passages.name: IntroPumped

passages.text:
Uhm. Hi.... I'm Jessie.

[[Continue. ->HiJessie]]
passages.name: IntroShame

passages.text:
Hi. Want to play?

[["Sure." ->Sure]]

[["Maybe just sit for a spell?" ->JustSit]]
passages.name: HeyWantTo

passages.text:
I'm looking for work.

[[Continue. ->HeyWantTo]]

[["I'm a cowboy." ->I'mACowboy]]
passages.name: LookWork

passages.text:
I'm a cowboy.

[[Continue. ->ISee]] 

[["And I'm from Goldbeak Ranch." ->I'mform]]
passages.name: I'mACowboy

passages.text:
Sure!

[[Continue. ->I'mNona]]
passages.name: Sure
I'mform

passages.text: Double-click this passage to edit it.
passages.name: DontKnowRules

passages.text:
What are we playing?

[[Continue. ->TombTownPoker]]
passages.name: WhatAreWe

passages.text:
Ah, ehm sorry. Hi.

[[Mind if I sit down? -> MindIfI]]

[[Say nothing. ->AshamedJessie]]
passages.name: AhEhmHi

passages.text:
I see. I'm Nona. Take a Seat.

[[Continue. ->FreeSeat]]
passages.name: ISee
FreeSeat

passages.text:
I'm Nona.

[[Continue. ->FreeSeat]]
passages.name: I'mNona

passages.text:
Mind if I join you for a round?

[[Continue. ->FreeSeat]]
passages.name: MindIfI
AshamedJessie

passages.text:
Uhm, do you mind if I sit down?

[[Continue. ->FreeSeat]]
passages.name: CouldIJoin

passages.text: {SceneA2.1 Jessie}
passages.name: LEAVING

passages.text:
Tombtown Poker. //They give you a long look and start to shuffle the cards.//

[["I'll pick it up as we play."->PickUp]]

links.name: "I'll pick it up as we play."

passages.name: TombTownPoker

passages.text:
Ah well, I know poker, guess I'll pick up the rest as we play.

[["So, Tomb-Towns. Are you from one?" ->FromTomb?]]
passages.name: PickUp

passages.text: Double-click this passage to edit it.
passages.name: AhOkay

passages.text:
Hi Jessie. I'm Nona. //There is a hint of a smile on their face.//

[["Mind if I sit down?" ->CouldIJoin]]
passages.name: HiJessie

passages.text:
So, are you from a tomb town?

[[Continue. ->NoneOfYour]]
passages.name: FromTomb?

passages.text: Double-click this passage to edit it.
passages.name: CoolHolo

passages.text:
So, a cowboy. Haven't heard that one before.

[["It's what I want." ->WhatIWant]]

[["Is that a problem?" ->ThatAProblem?]]
passages.name: SoACowboy

passages.text:
Yeah, I know. But it's what I want and who I am.

[[Continue. ->LookIntoDistance]]
passages.name: WhatIWant

passages.text:
Is that a problem for you?

[[Continue.->NoDontWorry]]
passages.name: ThatAProblem?

passages.text:
Mind if I just sit for a bit?

[[Continue. ->FreeSeat]]
passages.name: JustSit

passages.text:
//Nona looks into a distance for a little bit before giving you a little nod.//

[[Continue. ->RespectThat]]
passages.name: LookIntoDistance

passages.text:
I can respect that.

[["What's your story?"->WhatStory?]]

[["What are you playing?" ->TombTownPoker]]
passages.name: RespectThat

passages.text:
So what's your story?

[[Continue. ->NoneOfYour]]
passages.name: WhatStory?

passages.text:
Because if it is... I've had enough of that for one day.

[[Continue. ->Iheard]]
passages.name: BecauseIf

passages.text:
No, don't worry.


[["So, waht's your story?" ->WhatStory?]]
passages.name: NoDontWorry

passages.text: Double-click this passage to edit it.
passages.name: Iheard

passages.text:
None of your business.

[[Say nothing. ->MomentofSilence]]
passages.name: NoneOfYour

passages.text:
//Neither of you speaks for half a minute. Then Nona rolls their eyes and waves their right arm in your face.//

[[Continue.->Obviously]]
passages.name: MomentofSilence

passages.text:
Look, I'm obviously from a tomb town, okay? And I don't want to talk about it. I'm not welcome there anymore, so whatever you have in mind, you can forget it. Now, do you want to play?

[["Sorry, I know almost nothing about that all." ->Don't]]

[["What are we playing?" ->WhatAreWe]]

links.name: "Sorry, I know almost nothing about that all."

passages.name: Obviously

passages.text:
Sorry, I didn't mean to... I know almost nothing about that stuff. Horace mentioned it once or twice, and there's the radio, but other than that...

[[Continue.->WhoseHorace?]]
passages.name: Don't

passages.text:
Who is Horace?

[["My best friend" ->BestFriend]]
passages.name: WhoseHorace?

passages.text:
My best friend. He carried me here, has been all over the Reaches and knows everyone and everything. He's over there. 

[[You wave at Horace.->WaveAtHorace]]
passages.name: BestFriend

passages.text:
//You wave at Horace, and he gives you a nod. Nona turns in her seat to look at him. Neither of them moves for a a few seconds. Then the remaining cow-girl flickers, and is replaced by a holographic Horace. Adequatly shrunk to fit the seat, of course. Nona smiles at him.//

[[Continue. ->HeyTherrreee]]
passages.name: WaveAtHorace

passages.text:
Hey there. //You've never seen Horace wink before.//

[[Continue. ->NiceTech]]
passages.name: HeyTherrreee

passages.text:
Nice Tech. Bit old though. 

[[Continue. ->IPrefer]]
passages.name: NiceTech

passages.text:
I prefer... experienced. So, what are we playing? 

[[Continue. ->TombTownPokerButYourFriend]]
passages.name: IPrefer

passages.text:
Well, I'm always playing Tombtown Poker, but since your friend here doesn't seem to have a clue about it, I assume neither do you?

[[Continue. ->He'sJust]]
passages.name: TombTownPokerButYourFriend

passages.text:
Quite the opposite, just never thought to bother teach someone only half the ruleset. But since you have all the necessary... parts, I'd love to have a go at you.

[[Continue. ->YourOn]]
passages.name: He'sJust

passages.text:
//Nona raises an eyebrow at horace before turning to you.// Sorry Cowboy, but it looks like I need to teach your Horse a lesson. And we need your spot for the third Player.//

[["Oh, uh. Okay." ->What'sHappening]]
passages.name: YourOn

passages.text:
Oh, uhm. Okay.

[[Get up. ->GettingUp]]
passages.name: What'sHappening
GettingUp
